---
title: "Diagnostics"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library("ggplot2")
library("dplyr")
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}
x <- rpois(4000, 5)
x <- data.frame(x)

ggplot(x) +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = x), binwidth = 0.5)

ggplot(x) +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = sqrt(1 + x)), binwidth = 0.1)
```


```{r}
x <- exp(matrix(rnorm(5e3 * 2), 5e3, 2))
x <- data.frame(x)

ggplot(x) +
  geom_point(aes(x = X1, y = X2), alpha = 0.2)

ggplot(x) +
  geom_point(aes(x = X1, y = X2), alpha = 0.2) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  scale_y_log10()
```
